## Public Static Functions

### ensureType() {#a63540fe3243b44a62cb656c73274f8ac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAValueSimplifyImpl::ensureType (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp; V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &amp; Ty, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; CtxI, bool Check)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Ensure the return value is <code>V</code> with type <code>Ty</code>, if not possible return nullptr.

If <code>Check</code> is true we will only verify such an operation would suceed and return a non-nullptr value if that is the case. No IR is generated or modified.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l06182">6182</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### reproduceInst() {#ad87f4b76b6846d029880d6b9012a7e69}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AAValueSimplifyImpl::reproduceInst (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/abstractattribute">AbstractAttribute</a> &amp; QueryingAA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &amp; Ty, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; CtxI, bool Check, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp; VMap)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Reproduce <code>I</code> with type <code>Ty</code> or return nullptr if that is not posisble.

If <code>Check</code> is true we will only verify such an operation would suceed and return a non-nullptr value if that is the case. No IR is generated or modified.

Reproduce <code>V</code> with type <code>Ty</code> or return nullptr if that is not posisble.

If <code>Check</code> is true we will only verify such an operation would suceed and return a non-nullptr value if that is the case. No IR is generated or modified.
